name: Hugh Jackman
description: Australian actor best known for his role as Wolverine in the X-Men series.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Hugh Jackman was born in 1968 in Sydney, Australia. He pursued acting at an early stage, attending the Western Australian Academy of Performing Arts.

content.title: Career
content.body: Hugh Jackman's breakthrough role came in 2000 with the film *X-Men*, where he portrayed Wolverine, a character he became famous for over the next two decades. Besides an impressive run as Wolverine, Jackman has displayed his versatility with roles in films such as *The Prestige*, *Les Misérables*, and *The Greatest Showman*. Jackman is also known for his performances in theater, notably the musical *The Boy from Oz*, which won him a Tony Award.

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Jackman has frequently collaborated with director Christopher Nolan (*The Prestige*) and has worked alongside actors like Christian Bale, Michael Caine, and Anne Hathaway.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Hugh Jackman is one of Hollywood's most beloved Australian actors. His portrayal of Wolverine has left a lasting impression on the superhero genre. He has been recognized with numerous awards, including a Golden Globe for *Les Misérables* and a Tony Award for *The Boy from Oz*.
